医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
性格决定追剧：研究揭示了为什么我们无法停止流媒体人格特质，尤其是对体验的开放性和认知需求，会影响 OTT 服务的使用和追剧习惯，揭示个体差异与媒体消费行为之间的复杂关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Personality-dictates-binge-watching-Study-reveals-why-we-cant-stop-streaming.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Personality-dictates-binge-watching-Study-reveals-why-we-cant-stop-streaming.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83c2474c-8362-4386-a3e1-f2131192a5a8 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 21:22:00 -0400 Personality dictates binge-watching: Study reveals why we can't stop streaming
研究表明去除皮肤细菌可增强大脑注意力信号研究人员发现皮肤微生物群与大脑认知功能之间存在联系，表明去除皮肤细菌可能会提高注意力水平。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-reveals-skin-bacteria-removal-boosts-brain-attention-signals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-reveals-skin-bacteria-removal-boosts-brain-attention-signals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=566b7c1f-e5ef-4338-9f0a-7b9d6d7eb1c7 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 20:21:00 -0400 Study reveals skin bacteria removal boosts brain attention signals
矿物质如何影响女性的生育能力和月经健康研究回顾了锌、硒和铁等矿物质在支持女性生殖健康方面的重要作用，强调它们对激素调节、排卵和子宫内膜健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/How-minerals-influence-womens-fertility-and-menstrual-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/How-minerals-influence-womens-fertility-and-menstrual-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=07167d6f-3723-4b67-9cd7-2c13ed66feee Wed, 03 Apr 2024 20:00:00 -0400 How minerals influence women's fertility and menstrual health
IBD 会影响癌症风险吗？研究表明，炎症性肠病与癌症风险增加之间没有很强的遗传联系，但欧洲人群中克罗恩病和溃疡性结肠炎除外。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Does-IBD-affect-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Does-IBD-affect-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6aaa262-59b5-4bd2-b14d-6f056c2b8bd7 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 19:40:00 -0400 Does IBD affect cancer risk?
研究探讨大麻的使用如何影响母乳和哺乳研究回顾了怀孕和哺乳期间使用大麻的影响，强调了大麻素影响导致的母乳成分和哺乳期的潜在变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-explores-how-cannabis-use-affects-breast-milk-and-lactation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-explores-how-cannabis-use-affects-breast-milk-and-lactation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9115a0a9-0bb8-4e44-8b0c-9a3cbefc5af3 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 19:31:00 -0400 Study explores how cannabis use affects breast milk and lactation
研究人员发现了一种有前途的方法来去除阿尔茨海默病中的淀粉样斑块阿尔茨海默病始于一种称为β淀粉样蛋白的粘性蛋白，它在大脑中积聚成斑块，引发一系列事件，导致大脑萎缩和认知能力下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Researchers-find-a-promising-approach-to-remove-amyloid-plaques-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Researchers-find-a-promising-approach-to-remove-amyloid-plaques-in-Alzheimers-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9ec09213-ab4e-4e85-9a8f-edbb4d608b7c Wed, 03 Apr 2024 15:06:59 -0400 Researchers find a promising approach to remove amyloid plaques in Alzheimer's disease
研究强调基于社区的幽门螺杆菌筛查降低胃癌风险的潜力如果我们能够消除黑人、亚洲人、拉丁裔和其他弱势群体患胃癌的主要危险因素，结果会怎样呢？迈阿密大学米勒医学院西尔维斯特综合癌症中心的一项新研究表明，向高危社区提供免费、可及的幽门螺杆菌感染（胃癌的主要危险因素）检测和治疗的可行性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-highlights-pottial-of-community-based-H-pylori-screening-to-reduce-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Study-highlights-pottial-of-community-based-H-pylori-screening-to-reduce-gastric-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82490be6-d1a1-4be9-9892-6c1e7043fca0 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 14:48:00 -0400 Study highlights potential of community-based H. pylori screening to reduce gastric cancer risk
尽管吸烟减少，肺癌发病率并未按预期下降尽管瑞典吸烟人数急剧下降，但人口中肺癌病例的下降幅度却没有达到预期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Lung-cancer-rates-not-declined-as-expected-despite-decrease-in-smoking.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Lung-cancer-rates-not-declined-as-expected-despite-decrease-in-smoking.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ae2ad34-7417-4b1e-b034-5525eb29647d Wed, 03 Apr 2024 14:34:43 -0400 Lung cancer rates not declining as expected despite decrease in smoking
基因分析揭示成人慢性肾脏病的隐藏原因慢性肾病 (CKD) 在成年人中极为流行，影响全球超过 8 亿人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Genetic-analysis-reveals-hidden-causes-of-chronic-kidney-disease-in-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Genetic-analysis-reveals-hidden-causes-of-chronic-kidney-disease-in-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9a21a73a-adba-4295-86d2-d22ed4055c97 Wed, 03 Apr 2024 14:25:17 -0400 Genetic analysis reveals hidden causes of chronic kidney disease in adults
卢里儿童医院在伊利诺伊州首次对杜氏肌营养不良症进行基因治疗2024 年 3 月 27 日，芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院使用 ELEVIDYS (delandistrogene moxeparvovec-rokl) 治疗了首例患者，这是针对杜氏肌营养不良症（一种以进行性肌肉损伤和无力为特征的罕见遗传性疾病）的首个基因疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Lurie-Childrens-Hospital-administers-first-gene-therapy-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy-in-Illinois.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240403/Lurie-Childrens-Hospital-administers-first-gene-therapy-for-Duchenne-muscular-dystropy-in-Illinois.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=117ba062-0785-4fbe-b361-469011637baa Wed, 03 Apr 2024 14:14:02 -0400 Lurie Children's Hospital administers first gene therapy for Duchenne muscular dystrophy in Illinois
